notifications.empty: You're all caught up! New alerts will appear here.

settings.title: Settings

emptyState.title: No matches found
emptyState.description: Adjust your search to discover available settings.

settings.signInPrompt: Please sign in to view your settings.

categories.accountDescription: Manage your profile and contact details.
categories.preferencesDescription: Adjust regional settings and accessibility preferences.
categories.securityDescription: Manage sign-in methods and account protection.
categories.appearanceDescription: Tune theme, density and top bar styling.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Update your display name and public identity.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Primary contact details for account communication.

displayName.label: Display name
displayName.helper: Shown to other administrators and guards.

email.label: Email
email.description: Primary email associated with your account.

language.label: Language
language.description: Select the language used across the interface.

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.helper: Applies to reports and scheduling features.

receiveSms.label: SMS notifications
receiveSms.description: Deliver important alerts by text message.

twoFactor.label: Two-factor authentication
twoFactor.description: Require a secondary verification when signing in.

themePreference.label: Manual theme
themePreference.description: Pick a theme when not following the system.

themeEditor.label: Theme editor
themeEditor.description: Open advanced styling controls for brand colors.

density.label: Density
density.description: Choose spacing density for tables and layouts.

webhookUrl.label: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.helper: We'll send event payloads to this HTTPS endpoint.

profile.title: Profile preferences
profile.description: Control how your profile appears to other members.

profileVisibility.label: Profile visibility
profileVisibility.description: Display your profile details to teammates across the workspace.

digestLanguage.label: Digest language
digestLanguage.description: Select the language used for summary emails.

defaultLanding.label: Default landing page
defaultLanding.description: Choose where to go right after signing in.

defaultLandingSite.label: Default site
defaultLandingSite.description: Pick the site we should open when your landing preference is a specific site.
defaultLandingSite.emptyState: Add a site to your account to enable this option.

privacy.title: Privacy controls
privacy.description: Configure retention and session safety policies.

auditTrail.label: Audit trails
auditTrail.description: Keep a log of account activity and administrator changes.

sessionTimeout.label: Session timeout
sessionTimeout.description: Log out inactive sessions after the selected duration.

alerts.title: Incident alerts
alerts.description: Pick the operational events that should trigger alerts.

criticalIncidents.label: Critical incidents
criticalIncidents.description: Notify me when urgent incidents are escalated.

visitorArrivals.label: Visitor arrivals
visitorArrivals.description: Alert me when visitors arrive without pre-approval.

channels.title: Notification channels
channels.description: Choose how alerts are delivered to you.

channelSms.label: SMS alerts
channelSms.description: Send important notifications by text message.

channelPush.label: Push alerts
channelPush.description: Deliver notifications via push to the mobile app.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Strengthen sign-in with layered security controls.

mfa.label: Multi-factor authentication
mfa.description: Require a second factor during sign-in.

passwordRotation.label: Password rotation
passwordRotation.description: Force users to reset passwords on this cadence.

sessions.title: Session management
sessions.description: Limit concurrent access and location usage.

sessionLimit.label: Active session limit
sessionLimit.description: Maximum number of devices that can stay signed in.

geoLock.label: Geographic locking
geoLock.description: Restrict new sessions to trusted regions.

generalLook.title: General appearance
generalLook.description: Customize core theme and density preferences.

themeMode.label: Theme mode
themeMode.description: Select the theme applied throughout the product.

density.label: Density
density.description: Control spacing for data grids and navigation.

topbar.title: Top bar
topbar.description: Tune the navigation bar effects and badges.

topbarBlur.label: Top bar blur
topbarBlur.description: Adjust the frosted glass effect strength.

topbarPatternEnabled.label: Show pattern overlay
topbarPatternEnabled.description: Enable the decorative pattern on the top bar background.

topbarPatternKind.label: Pattern style
topbarPatternKind.description: Choose which pattern motif appears behind the navigation.

topbarPatternOpacity.label: Pattern opacity
topbarPatternOpacity.description: Control how visible the pattern overlay should be.

topbarPatternScale.label: Pattern scale
topbarPatternScale.description: Set the size of the pattern elements.

charts.title: Charts
charts.description: Pick palettes and motion for analytics visuals.

chartPalette.label: Chart palette
chartPalette.description: Choose the color family used for charts.

dashboard.subtitle: Monitor guard operations and resident activity across sites.
